extendedInfo.description: **FREE, OPEN SOURCE, NO ADS**This app is centered around the basic question "[expletive of choice], am I gonna miss the BART?". Enter your most traveled routes and receive a real-time listing of upcoming departures in one click. Unlike most apps, the estimated time until departure actually counts down second-by-second, so you'll know just how fast you need to run to the station!  Note that estimated departure times are, in fact, estimates, though the general accuracy of an estimate is shown beneath the countdown. After a minute or so, the accuracy of the estimates should automatically increase.Unique features of this app:* Streamlined for experienced BART commuters* Real-time departure info refreshes automatically, and the accuracy of the departure estimates increases over time* Estimated arrival times* Pick which train you want to board, and information about that departure will be available in your notification tray.* Set a departure alarm to go off a few minutes before your train leaves (you pick how much advance warning you want)* Routes are entered with both the origin station and the destination station, so the real-time departures listing only lists trains that will actually get you to your destination* Phone will not sleep while viewing departure times (the screen will only dim), so you only need a quick glance at the phone to see how long you have left to catch the train* Zoomable offline system map* Fares and next departure time are shown in the saved route listing* No ads and open source; Built purely for the love of programming, and because I didn't like any of the other BART apps out thereIf you have any bugs to report or suggestions for the app, please email them to bartrunner@dougkeen.com.  I can't guarantee that I'll have a chance to respond to every email, but I'll do my best!NOTE TO GALAXY S USERS:I'm aware of an issue with that specific phone model that causes the app to crash consistently.  I'm working hard on a fix, so keep your eyes out for an update!  Meanwhile, please contact me at bartrunner@dougkeen.com if you can volunteer some time to help me track down the problem.

reviews.title: use it everyday!
reviews.comment: great app. use it everyday on the way to and from work. does exactly what you want a Bart app to do. clean interface. many thanks to the dev!
reviews.author: Clint Maples

reviews.title: Lacks full timetable
reviews.comment: You can only see departure times in the immediate future. Omitting full timetables is a complete fail. Useless unless you are already close to the departing station.
reviews.author: Paul Sanford

reviews.title: Can\'t say enough good things...
reviews.comment: Extremely useful app, quick, easy to use, accurate. And I swear, I reported a quick departure lookup crash I was having to the developer, and alas, a new version that fixed the issue was released a mere six hours later... I felt like the update was just for me! ;)   Good stuff!
reviews.author: Tommy Mc

reviews.title: Darned good app
reviews.comment: This is the app that I\'d recommend to BART commuters... Real time info, upcoming trains, delay notification... Indispensable really.
reviews.author: Sun-Yoong Oh

reviews.title: Does not do what\'s needed
reviews.comment: Requires network access which is not available at most places on BART. So you can\'t even check a schedule while on a train or in a station. Useless.
reviews.author: Kenneth Garges

reviews.comment: Very nice.  Appreciate the countdown to departure.
reviews.author: Yejide Ankobia

reviews.title: Good Bart app with minor issues
reviews.comment: Installed on galaxy note 2. When setting the alarm, and using the looking at the status bar, does not reflect the correct departure time
reviews.author: Craig Nersesian

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: Only feedback would be to add a date filter and maybe touch up the interface a little.  Love the map
reviews.author: Erik Buttram

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Saved my butt countless times.  Definitely recommend it.
reviews.author: Misty Mulhall

reviews.title: Best app to date for bart
reviews.comment: No complaints here. Nice work..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Awesome app! works great on an s4. Love it.
reviews.author: Asher S

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: Very good app, really dead on accuracy. Definitely would recommend this for any who takes bart
reviews.author: Omar Hernandez

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Can run  from the office and know just when to catch the next train!
reviews.author: Patrick Heim

reviews.title: Better than the other BART app I used to use!
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to utilize it some more! The features on it e far auperior to what I am used to using. Interface is simpler and looks sleeker too!
reviews.author: Stella Tatola

reviews.title: Best BART app
reviews.comment: This is my first play store review, to let everyone know I\'ve fallen in love with this app. It\'s always their most reliable BART tracker I\'ve tried.  Thanks!!
reviews.author: Dori Daniels

reviews.title: A widget would rule
reviews.comment: This app is the bees knees, but I would totally pay a buck or two if he created a widget.
reviews.author: James Garvin

reviews.title: Dang, this is useful.
reviews.comment: It really is useful.
reviews.author: Chiaki Hirai

reviews.comment: Why is the app not addressing Bart striking?
reviews.author: June Jefferson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Accurate,  and very easy to operate.
reviews.author: Niraj Desai

reviews.comment: Doesnt accurately report delays, which is really the point isn\'t it.
reviews.author: Paige Miller
